name: Titanic LCD
description:
Save the passengers as they jump from the burning ship. Don't let them get eaten by the sharks! Each lifeboat holds up to four passengers. Catch the falling passengers in a lifeboat and move it to shore to rescue them.

Game A: left and right buttons cause the rescuers to move two lifeboats, one on each screen.

Game B: there is only one lifeboat!

FEATURES:
- High scores via Game Center.
- Sharks eating passengers.
- Insane burning ship action.
- Zoom option.
